name: stockaiq
description: StockAIQ - Real-time Stock Analysis & Trading Signals Platform

scripts.install: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cp -r frontend/.next/static frontend/.next/standalone/frontend/.next/ && cp -r frontend/public frontend/.next/standalone/frontend/
